Article Title: India to host 2029 World Police and Fire Games, Amit Shah says 'a moment of great pride'
Article Text: NEW DELHI: Home minister Amit Shah on Friday welcomed the designation of India as the host country for the 2029 World Police and Fire Games (WPFG), describing it as ‚Äúa moment of great pride for every Indian citizen‚Äù.The biennial games will be held across Ahmedabad, Gandhinagar and Ekta Nagar in Kevadia, with the participation of over 10,000 athletes representing the police, fire, customs and correctional services from across 70 countries.‚ÄúBharat winning the prestigious bid to host the event is a global recognition of our sprawling sports infrastructure built under the leadership of PM Shri @narendramodi Ji. Ahmedabad being selected as the venue of the event that brings together police, fire and disaster services to compete in more than 50 sports, is a testament to the city‚Äôs rising stature as a sporting destination,‚Äù Shah said in a post on X on Friday.India will be the first South Asian nation to host the WPFG since the games‚Äô inception in 1985. India now joins the elite clubs of past hosts like Canada, Australia, the Netherlands, China and the US.The announcement of India as the 2029 WPFG host followed India‚Äôs final presentation to the California Police Athletic Federation (CPAF), the governing body of the games, on June 25 in Birmingham, Alabama.
Article Summary: The biennial games will be held across ahmedabad, gandhinagar and ekta nagar in kevadia. Over 10,000 athletes representing the police, fire, customs and correctional services from across 70 countries. India will be the first south asian nation to host the wpfg since the games‚Äô inception in 1985.

Article Title: WWE SmackDown Results & Highlights: Cody Rhodes vs. Randy Orton, Nia Jax Challenges Tiffany Stratton, CM Punk's Shocking Appearance
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Opening segment with Cody Rhodes and Randy Orton

Jimmy Uso vs. JC Mateo (with Solo Sikoa )



Zelina Vega vs. Giulia for the Women‚Äôs U.S. Championship

‚ÄúDIY‚Äù Johnny Gargano and Tommaso Ciampa vs. Andrade and Rey Fenix

WWE Tag Team Championship

WWE Women‚Äôs Championship



The night before the Night of Champions sees a star-studded Kingdom arena in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. From WWE Women‚Äôs Champion Tiffany Stratton, to the woman she will face tonight, Nia Jax, to WWE Tag Team Champions Montez Ford and Angelo Dawkins and Women‚Äôs U.S. Champion Zelina Vega, Giulia, Jade Cargill, and Asuka, Riyadh is a myriad of wrestling superstars.The June 27th edition of WWE SmackDown is a preview to the big night, where the King and Queen of the Ring for 2025 will be decided. But not to fret, the night in itself has some pretty high profile matches to go through, and John Cena is also set to be featured alongside CM Punk, Cody Rhodes, Randy Orton, and LA KnightCody Rhodes makes his entrance after being introduced by ring announcer Mark Nash to the crowd cheering for him. He was about to speak when he got interrupted by entrance music. Randy Orton walked to the ring, and the crowd continued to sing his theme song even after it stopped playing. The segment then got cut short for international viewers because of a feed issue with Netflix. The streaming company posted a graphic apologizing for the interruption, and then a ‚Äúwe‚Äôll be right back‚Äù graphic appeared.The Bloodline members or whatever is left of it, are still fighting against each other.And this time it was a match between JC Mateo and Jimmy Uso with an appearance from Solo Sikoa. Mateo looked to be the dominant one from the beginning, even though Jimmy Uso tried his best to overcome his opponent. At the end, Uso went up top and then jumped over and rolled, but Mateo was ready for him and defeated Uso by pinfall in about 6 minutes into the match.In an after match segment, Solo Sikoa, who tried to distract Jimmy Uso during the match, helped him up and asked him if he was ready to come back. In return, he got slapped by his cousin while fans booed. Jacob Fatu made an entrance to the crowd cheering for him, and dropped a Samoan Drop on Mateo after running into the ring, and then a double jump moonsault. Uso then pushed Fatu out of the way and superkicked Sikoa out of the ring, bringing an end to the segment.In a backstage segment, #DIY and other tag teams are seen talking about The Wyatt Sicks when SmackDown General Manager Nick Aldis comes in. Listening to their chatter, Aldis calls in Andrade and asks him to find a partner to face a now furious #DIYBoth Giulia and Zelina Vega looked to be equally matched as the fight started. When Giulia hit a double underhook superplex, Vega retaliated with a Code Red. The match seemed like it could be in anyone's favor, before Giulia kneed her opponent in the face before hitting Vega with a Northern Lights Bomb, defeating her in roughly 7:30 minutes to win the Women‚Äôs U.S. Championship by pinfall.In another backstage segment, Charlotte Flair and Alexa Bliss are seen exchanging a few words before the latter walks off. Could this be the beginning of an unlikely partnership?Then Aksuka and Jade Cargill make their way into the ring before tomorrow night, where they will face off against each other for the Queen of the Ring title. They exchange a few words before Money in the Bank winner Naomi cuts them off with her entrance. There is a strong chance she will cash in her MITB win during the Night of Champions event the next night.In yet another backstage segment, Aleister Black walks in on Raw General Manager Adam Pearce and SmackDown General Manager Nick Aldis discussing the WWE Women‚Äôs Tag Team Championship. But it all turns into chaos when R-Truth bursts in demanding to get a face-off against John Cena. Aldis tells him that John Cena is in Riyadh to fight CM Punk, but R-Truth says he is here for Cena before walks off. All this while, Black is there watching everything happen. At the end he walks off. Is another storyline brewing backstage?Andrade bringing in Rey Fenix was a surprise for many, and the crowd are seen cheering for what is to come. The two tag teams go up against each other one after the other. At one time Fenix is seen running to the top rope and kicking Tommaso Ciampa in the face, while in the next moment fans can see #DIY hitting Andrade with the Shatter Machine for a near fall. At the end Andrade and Rey Fenix defeated ‚ÄúDIY‚Äù Johnny Gargano and Tommaso Ciampa by pinfall in about 15 minutes into the match.After the earlier backstage segment, R-Truth gets in the ring to a deafening crowd response. He is in his vibe, and calls out John Cena. But suddenly, Aleister Black comes from behind and hits him with Black Mass and a cryptic message, before walking off. The audience is left bewildered.The Street Profits sees Angelo Dawkins and Montez Ford going against The Wyatt Sicks members, Joe Gacy and Dexter Lumis. To make things interesting, Erik Rowan, Nikki Cross, and Uncle Howdy also make their appearance, as things go awry minutes into the match. Los Garza, The Motor City Machine Guns, and Fraxiom are all seen coming to ringside, and even the recent losers #DIY are there. A brawl breaks out, leading to the match being thrown out.The Last Woman Standing Match seesNia Jax going against the current title holder, Tiffany Stratton. Before the bell can even ring, Nia Jax throws Tiffany Stratton into the ring post. Jax's physically imposing nature comes in handy against a lithe opponent like Stratton, but the latter manages to keep herself in the match over and over. Suddenly, Naomi runs into the ring with her Money in the Bank briefcase. But while she is talking to the referee, Stratton hits her before sending Jax on top of her. In the end, Stratton picked up the MITB briefcase and knocked Jax off before taking the win for herself with a pinfall after 17 minutes in the ring.The final segment of the night saw WWE Champion John Cena making his entrance with his title belt held high. He said, "This is what a winner looks like,‚Äù and called CM Punk a loser. CM Punk then made his entry wearing a Chicago Cubs jersey, a chain with a padlock on it, a Chicago Bulls hat on backwards, and jorts, mocking Cena's usual attire.Punk also put on big rings resembling Cena, before saying, ‚ÄúYo, check it, this is basic Punkanomics. Don‚Äôt adjust your television set, your eyes are just right. This clown plagiarized my pipe bomb, so now I‚Äôm stealing WordLife.‚Äù John Cena looked completely shocked at the tune of events as Punk continued rapping and rhyming. The Best in the World then dropped the mic and did the infamous ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt see me‚Äù hand gesture in Cena‚Äôs face, bringing an end to the show.PS. From next week onwards, SmackDown will be back to its two-hour long format.Also Read: WWE Night of Champions 2025 preview and streaming details (06/28/25): Full match card, show highlights, how to watch, and more
Article Summary: The june 27th edition of wwe smackdown is a preview to the big night, where the king and queen of the ring for 2025 will be decided. The night before the night of champions sees a star-studded kingdom arena in riyadh, saudi arabia. John cena is also set to be featured alongside cm punk, cody rhodes, randy orton, and la knight.

Article Title: "More commercials than playoff wins": Joe Burrow gets brutally trolled as fans question his performance amid dating rumors with Olivia Ponton
Article Text:
Joe Burrow gets trolled for losing at the playoffs last season.(Image via Cooper Neill/Getty)

Joe Burrow gets brutally trolled in a recent post amid speculations about his relationship with Olivia Ponton



Joe Burrow has gotten brutally trolled in a recent post made by NFL.(Image via X)

Joe Burrow had spoken about his privacy being invaded previously

Joe Burrow, one of the most popular and talented players in the NFL, has had a lot of interest around his dating life and model Olivia Ponton for a couple of months now. The two were first rumoured to be together in December 2024 but neither of them have addressed the speculations yet. While Joe Burrow is gearing up for the upcoming season, it seems many of his fans are pretty disappointed by him.In the last few weeks, the Cincinnati Bengals‚Äô star player, Joe Burrow has been spotted training hard at the minicamps.Recently, the NFL took to its official social media accounts to share a few recent pictures of Joe Burrow. The caption of the post read as, ‚ÄúSeason 6 of Joe Shiesty üî•‚Äù but it has raised eyebrows among fans.A fan by the username @frogjumps took to X and wrote, ‚ÄúOverrated af . Bro whole legacy is a SB loss lol‚Äù, while another fan by the username @SeamusMcRizzle commented, ‚ÄúMore hairstyles than playoff wins.‚ÄùA third fan by the username @LiquidityAce wrote, ‚ÄúJoe Shiesty‚Äôs overrated! Without a solid defense, Bengals will flop again. Season 6 is just hype.‚ÄùAnother fan by the username @onlytessaquinnn posted, ‚Äúthis man got more commercials than wins in january‚Äù, while a fifth fan by the username @BillsMafiaLeaps noted, ‚ÄúWhy are we hyping him up???? He Didn't make the playoffs the last 2 years!???‚ÄùJoe Burrow has not addressed the criticism he has received for his performance in the last few seasons even though the star player is considered to be one of the most talented players in the league currently.As of now, it seems like Joe Burrow is focusing on his prep and his rumoured girlfriend, Olivia Ponton.While Joe Burrow has not directly addressed his dating life, he had issued a statement after TMZ Sports had reported that Olivia Ponton was the first to report the star player‚Äôs house was broken into in December 2024.Joe Burrow had said, "I feel like my privacy has been violated in more ways than one, and way more is already out there than I would want out there and that I care to share.‚ÄùAlso Read: "He is her ultimate hype man": Travis Kelce breaks social media silence for Taylor Swift and fans are panicking about it
Article Summary: Cincinnati bengals star player, joe burrow has been spotted training hard at the minicamps. The nfl took to its official social media accounts to share a few recent pictures of the star player. The caption of the post read as, ‚Äúseason 6 of joe shiesty üî•‚Äù but it has raised eyebrows among fans.

Article Title: NHL Trade Rumors: Hurricanes emerge as frontrunner for Nikolaj Ehlers as Kings and Sharks circle Jets winger
Article Text:
Nikolaj Ehlers is set to test free agency on July 1 (Image via AP)

Carolina Hurricanes viewed as frontrunner among teams interested in Ehlers

Kings and Sharks could shape Ehlers‚Äô next chapter, but fit varies by team

Elliotte Friedman & Bob Stauffer on Evander Kane trade, free agency, & NHL Entry Draft on Oilers Now

Jets still hoping to make their case for long-term loyalty

As NHL free agency approaches, Winnipeg Jets winger Nikolaj Ehlers is quickly becoming one of the most sought-after names on the market. After 10 seasons in Manitoba, the Danish forward has reportedly told the Jets he intends to test free agency on July 1‚Äînews that has sparked interest from multiple franchises across the league.NHL trade rumors are swirling as Winnipeg Jets forward Nikolaj Ehlers prepares to hit free agency, drawing serious interest from contenders like the Hurricanes, Kings, and Sharks ahead of July 1.‚ÄúHearing Nikolaj Ehlers has informed the Jets he will go to free agency on July 1. Door not closed on Manitoba, but will test the market,‚Äù tweeted NHL insider Elliotte Friedman on Thursday.While the Winnipeg Jets are still hoping to retain the skilled winger, it‚Äôs clear other teams are preparing aggressive pitches. Among them, the Carolina Hurricanes‚Äîvalued at $1.25 billion by Forbes‚Äîare reportedly ‚Äúvery serious‚Äù about signing Ehlers, according to Friedman, who spoke during Oilers Now with Bob Stauffer.‚ÄúI think there are definitely some things in motion,‚Äù Friedman said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve heard Carolina is very serious about Ehlers, but I also think he could end up just about anywhere. That‚Äôs what‚Äôs going to make this a really interesting situation ‚Äî there are a lot of teams poking around, and they all seem to have slightly different priorities.‚ÄùBeyond Carolina, both the Los Angeles Kings and San Jose Sharks have emerged as potential suitors. The Kings are exploring multiple roster moves, while the Sharks, facing pressure to reach the salary cap floor, could view Ehlers as a strategic addition despite their ongoing rebuild.‚ÄúSome teams are looking at shorter-term fits,‚Äù Friedman noted. ‚ÄúThen you‚Äôve got teams like San Jose who need to hit the cap floor. So, Ehlers could have multiple types of suitors. ... I‚Äôve also heard L.A. has a few irons in the fire.‚ÄùDespite Ehlers' intention to explore options, Winnipeg GM Kevin Cheveldayoff hasn‚Äôt given up hope. He emphasized the team‚Äôs long-standing relationship with Ehlers, who was drafted by the Jets and has been a consistent top-six forward.‚ÄúNikolaj has been a player that has grown up in our organization,‚Äù Cheveldayoff said. ‚ÄúDrafted, developed him, we'll put our best foot forward with him to try to make our case to be a unique Jet-for-life-type player.‚ÄùAlso Read: NHL CBA overhaul: Auston Matthews sparks dress code rebellion as league expands to 84-game season With 63 points in 69 games last season, Ehlers‚Äô mix of speed, offensive production, and two-way play makes him one of the most versatile forwards available this summer‚Äîguaranteeing a competitive bidding war once the free agent window opens.
Article Summary: Winnipeg jets winger nikolaj ehlers is set to test free agency on july 1. The danish forward has reportedly told the jets he intends to test the market. The carolina hurricanes are reportedly "very serious" about signing ehlers. The los angeles kings and san jose sharks have emerged as potential suitors.

Article Title: IND U19 vs ENG U19: Five sixes! Vaibhav Suryavanshi's whirlwind knock lights up U19 ODI in England
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Team India Reach Birmingham | Updates on Arrival & Schedule

Poll How impressed were you with Vaibhav Suryavanshi's debut performance? Extremely impressed Fairly impressed Neutral Not impressed

Who'll Make it to the Playing XI for 2nd Test? | India‚Äôs Nets Session in Birmingham

NEW DELHI: Teen prodigy Vaibhav Suryavanshi made a dazzling first impression on English soil with a stunning 19-ball 48 in the first Youth ODI between India U19 and England U19 at the County Ground in Hove on Friday.The 14-year-old opener announced himself with a fearless display of strokeplay, smashing five sixes and three fours to set the tone for India's successful run chase.Chasing 175, Suryavanshi partnered with captain Ayush Mhatre to give India U19 a lightning start, adding 71 runs in just 7.3 overs. His blistering innings ended two short of a deserving half-century when he was caught by Tazeem Chaudry Ali off Ralphie Albert in the eighth over. Mhatre followed soon after, dismissed for 21 off 30 balls.The total, however, was not threatening for the team as India U19 registered a commanding six-wicket victory with 156 balls to spare. Wicketkeeper-batter Abhigyan Kundu, 45 not out off 34 balls, hit the winning six in the 24th over.Earlier in the day, England U19 chose to bat first but were bowled out for 174 in 42.2 overs. Rocky Flintoff, son of former England all-rounder Andrew Flintoff , top-scored for the hosts with a composed 56 off 90 balls, laced with three sixes and as many boundaries.India's bowlers dominated proceedings, with Kanishk Chouhan leading the charge with figures of 3 for 20 in his full quota of 10 overs. Mohamed Enaan (2/37), RS Ambrish (2/24), and Henil Patel (2/41) chipped in with two wickets apiece to dismantle the England batting order.Speaking ahead of the tour, Suryavanshi had told iplt20.com, ‚ÄúI will get a good experience of playing in England. We will try to win a trophy from there as well.‚ÄùIf his debut is anything to go by, Indian cricket may have unearthed yet another star for the future.
Article Summary: India u19 beat england u19 by six wickets in first youth odi in hove. Teen prodigy vaibhav suryavanshi made a dazzling first impression on english soil with a stunning 19-ball 48. Rocky flintoff, son of former england all-rounder andrew flintoff top-scored for the hosts.

Article Title: Kyrie Irving fires up after Paige Bueckers hits buzzer-beater three for Wings against Clark-less Fever
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Paige Bueckers hit a wild logo three at the buzzer and the crowd lost it

Paige Bueckers lit up the first half with a logo-range dagger that had fans on their feet and Kyrie Irving jumping out of his seat. It wasn‚Äôt just a buzzer-beater, it was a statement. As the Fever struggled without Caitlin Clark, Bueckers grabbed her moment, bringing energy, belief, and a little NBA magic to the floor. Her 12th point of the half might just be her most unforgettable.The vibe was electric at the American Airlines Center on June 27, 2025. During a close contest, Dallas Wings rookie Paige Bueckers pulled off a daring logo shot to finish the first half‚Äîher 12th point of the half‚Äîdoing it in true Caitlin Clark style, even with Clark out due to a groin injury. The crowd erupted, and as the referee's whistles still echoed, Bueckers sprinted to the sideline. Right there, Kyrie Irving‚ÄîBueckers‚Äôs self-proclaimed favorite NBA star‚Äîjumped up and gave her a quick dap, sealing the moment and merging WNBA talent with NBA stardom.At the end of the half, Indiana was still in the lead by 13, but the momentum had noticeably changed. The Fever, who were missing their superstar Caitlin Clark averaging 18.2 points, 8.9 assists, and 5.6 rebounds, but going through a rough patch with a 1-for-23 shooting slump from three-point range on the road, were feeling the pressure.Bueckers‚Äôs signature shot not only reduced the lead but also energized the Wings and their star-studded audience.Bueckers has always talked about her dream of having a big-game moment with Irving‚Äîever since she got to Dallas on Media Day, where she referred to him as her favorite player "forever". Now that dream has become a reality, proving her journey from an ACL comeback in college to thriving as a WNBA rookie in the same city as the nine-time NBA All-Star.Their shared background goes further: both dealt with ACL injuries (Irving‚Äôs in March 2025, Bueckers‚Äôs in 2022) and bounced back stronger, creating a natural connection. When Irving was courtside on Thursday, the combination of chants, whistles, and Bueckers‚Äôs shot resulted in one of the standout rookie moments of the young WNBA season.Even with her amazing performances, Bueckers‚Äôs team started this season at the bottom of the standings with a record of 4‚Äì12. Still, her personal stats‚Äî17.7 points, 5.8 assists, and 4.6 rebounds per game‚Äîare similar to Clark‚Äôs impressive numbers. She‚Äôs gaining national recognition, not only for her skills on the court but also for advocating for her fellow players‚Äîpublicly supporting Caitlin Clark and challenging the ‚Äúinhumane‚Äù pressure put on young talents.Also Read: LeBron James celebrates his electric boat team‚Äôs strong finish in Italy but the real test is still ahead As the Wings strive to narrow the distance, Bueckers keeps evolving amidst both attention and challenges. Plus, with Irving‚Äôs approval, that development seems deeply affirmed.
Article Summary: Paige bueckers hit a wild logo three at the buzzer and the crowd lost it. Kyrie irving jumped out of his seat and gave her a quick dap, sealing the moment. She's gaining national recognition for her skills on the court but also for advocating for her fellow players.

Article Title: "A spoiled child": Aaron Rodgers slammed as overrated and selfish in final NFL season amid Tom Brady comparisons
Article Text:
Aaron Rodgers' final NFL season with the Steelers is generating mixed reactions (Imagn Images)

Steelers embrace Aaron Rodgers , but NFL legends push back on his greatness

Skip Bayless and Terry Bradshaw pile on Aaron Rodgers‚Äô reputation



Aaron Rodgers is heading into his final NFL season, now wearing a Pittsburgh Steelers jersey, but the four-time MVP‚Äôs swan song is already facing scrutiny. At 41, the future Hall of Famer has made it clear this will be his last ride, but instead of a universal send-off, his legacy is under fire‚Äîespecially from legends and analysts who aren‚Äôt sold on his leadership credentials.The Steelers have rolled out the red carpet for Aaron Rodgers. Head coach Mike Tomlin praised the veteran quarterback, saying, ‚ÄúI mean, read his resume. We're excited about him being here.‚Äù Tight end Pat Freiermuth also drew comparisons between Rodgers and Pittsburgh icon Ben Roethlisberger, adding, ‚ÄúI think he's similar to Ben in a way, where you know he sees the game in a certain way.‚ÄùHowever, not all football voices are as supportive. Hall of Famer Cris Carter took a public shot at Rodgers on the Fully Loaded podcast, questioning his football intelligence and influence in team meetings compared to other greats. ‚ÄúPeople don't feel that same way about Aaron Rodgers because his knowledge of the game is not the same as these guys,‚Äù Carter said, referring to Peyton Manning and Tom Brady. ‚ÄúHe sounds like a spoiled child. ‚ÄùCarter argued that Rodgers lacks the elite mental grasp of the game that defined Brady‚Äôs and Manning‚Äôs success.He claimed Rodgers didn‚Äôt command the same respect in the Jets‚Äô locker room, saying, ‚ÄúThey would have been like, ‚ÄòGuess what we're getting ready to do? What that guy right there said.‚Äô Manning conducted meetings in Denver. Brady did the same in Tampa Bay.‚ÄùRodgers‚Äô image as a "diva" resurfaced once again when Skip Bayless blasted the Steelers for signing him. Even more brutally, Steelers legend Terry Bradshaw said Rodgers was a bad fit for the franchise and took a swipe at his off-field persona: ‚ÄúThat guy needs to stay in California, go somewhere and chew on bark and whisper to the gods out there.‚ÄùDespite the noise, Rodgers remains focused. ‚ÄúI mean, I played 20 freaking years, you know? It‚Äôs been a long run and I‚Äôve enjoyed it,‚Äù he told The Pat McAfee Show. ‚ÄúWhat better place to finish than in one of the cornerstone franchises of the NFL?‚ÄùAlso Read: Patrick Mahomes reignites Kansas City‚Äôs Super Bowl fire as Chiefs chase NFL immortality in 2025 As Rodgers looks to cement his legacy with one last Super Bowl run, the criticism he faces may either break the myth‚Äîor prove once and for all that greatness just wears differently on him.
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers' final nfl season with the steelers is generating mixed reactions. Hall of famer cris carter took a public shot at rodgers on the fully loaded podcast. Skip bayless blasted the steelers for signing him. Terry bradshaw said rodgers was a bad fit for the franchise and took a swipe at his off-field persona.

Article Title: From Connor McDavid‚Äôs decade of dominance to Matthew Schaefer‚Äôs tearful tribute, the 2025 NHL Draft night captured hockey‚Äôs full circle
Article Text:
NHL-Matthew Schaefer with NHL commissioner Gary Bettman looks on after being drafted (Credit: Getty Images)

It's been 10 years since Connor McDavid was drafted by the Edmonton Oilers

Matthew Schaefer honors late mother on NHL stage



Matthew Schaefer & family react to going No. 1 overall to the Islanders | 2025 NHL Draft

Draft night shows NHL‚Äôs circle of inspiration



Ten years after being selected first overall in the 2015 NHL Draft, Connor McDavid stood at the same event, this time as an icon, not a prospect. With each year, McDavid has not only lived up to the massive expectations that once surrounded him but surpassed them. The Edmonton Oilers captain‚Äôs journey now sets the benchmark for hockey excellence.McDavid‚Äôs decade-long presence has become a timeline for change within the league. From being the face of the Oilers rebuild to carrying the weight of Canadian hockey dreams, his consistency and leadership have solidified his role as both a star and a mentor figure to younger players entering the league today.As one career reaches a milestone, another begins. Matthew Schaefer, a highly skilled defenseman and the New York Islanders‚Äô first-round pick in the 2025 NHL Draft. This brought emotion to the stage by honoring his late mother during the biggest night of his young life.The draft allowed Schaefer to step into the NHL spotlight, but it also became a moment of remembrance, while much attention focused on which team chose which player, Schaefer reminded the hockey world of the personal costs.That often accompany professional dreams. his tribute turned a routine pick into one of the most powerful moments of the night.The dual narratives of Connor McDavid and Matthew Schaefer stood out as symbolic bookends of the NHL‚Äôs generational cycle. One player looking back on a decade of dominance, the other just beginning his climb. Together, they illustrated how deeply personal the draft can be, not just as a professional milestone, but as a human story.As the draft continues to usher in fresh talent, it also quietly builds on a history shaped by personal triumphs, heartbreaks, and legacies. This year, it did both, through McDavid‚Äôs reflection and Schaefer‚Äôs tribute. The heart of hockey beats in both.Also Read: NHL trade rumor: NHL trade twist as Canadiens and Blues reportedly engage Islanders over $12,000,000 defenseman per insider leak
Article Summary: It's been 10 years since connor mcdavid was drafted by the edmonton oilers. The edmonton oilers captain‚Äôs journey now sets the benchmark for hockey excellence. Matthew schaefer, a highly skilled defenseman and the new york islanders‚Äô first-round pick in the 2025 nhl draft, honored his late mother.

Article Title: Russell Wilson‚Äôs wife Ciara dazzles in dance tribute for La La Anthony, honors Kobe Bryant and Michael Jordan
Article Text:
Ciara and Russell Wilson have been winning hearts on and off the field (Image via Getty)

La La‚Äôs birthday bash becomes a fashion and friendship moment

Ciara La La tribute (Image via Instagram)

Ciara honors Kobe, MJ in heartfelt Fanatics Fest post



Ciara Princess Wilson is making waves once again ‚Äî this time not just for her music or red carpet looks, but for a heartfelt, high-energy tribute that brought together fashion, friendship, and sports royalty. The singer, entrepreneur, and wife of New York Giants quarterback Russell Wilson shared a stylish birthday video for her best friend La La Anthony ‚Äî and fans from the NFL and NBA circles couldn‚Äôt get enough.The post featured Ciara and La La dancing, posing, and celebrating in style. ‚ÄúHappy Birthday @lala! I love you so much! ‚Äù Ciara captioned the clip, which radiated fun and glamour. Ciara rocked a white tank top tucked into high-waisted, fluffy cream pants, paired with a denim-shade belt. She wore her long black hair down and accessorized with a gold pleated cross necklace and silver rings.La La, the former wife of 10-time NBA All-Star Carmelo Anthony, chose a bold denim cropped vest with a plunging neckline and sleek black leather pants. Her wide-brimmed blue police-style hat with a badge added flair, while her burgundy curls completed the standout look. La La and Carmelo, who share a son named Kiyan (born in 2007), were married from 2010 to 2021.Carmelo is currently valued at $160 million, according to Celebrity Net Worth.Alongside the birthday tribute, Ciara also gave fans a peek into her close friendship with Vanessa Bryant, widow of late NBA icon Kobe Bryant. During their recent time at Fanatics Fest, Ciara shared a carousel of moments with Vanessa and her children. ‚ÄúA Legendary Week Had to repost with all sound on! ,‚Äù she wrote.The most talked-about moment? A snap of Ciara standing between the jerseys of basketball greats Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant ‚Äî a subtle but powerful homage that resonated with fans across both sports.Also read: Russell Wilson‚Äôs wife Ciara stuns in fiery dance collab with DK Metcalf‚Äôs fianc√©e Normani Ciara, known for chart-topping hits, philanthropy, and entrepreneurial ventures, continues to shine beyond the stage. From her marriage to NFL star Russell Wilson to her deep bonds with NBA families, she has carved a unique space that fuses celebrity, style, and sports legacy ‚Äî all while keeping her message of love, loyalty, and empowerment front and center.
Article Summary: Ciara shared a video for her best friend la la anthony's birthday. The post featured ciara and la la dancing, posing, and celebrating in style. La la, the former wife of 10-time nba all-star carmelo anthony, chose a bold denim cropped vest.

Article Title: Breaking: Trey Hendrickson turns down $28M from Bengals, future in Cincinnati now uncertain
Article Text:
Trey Hendrickson turns down offer, puts Bengals' 2025 hopes at risk (Image via: Getty Images)

Trey Hendrickson still waiting as Bengals‚Äô contract offer fails to match market value

Bengals Star Trey Hendrickson SOUNDS OFF on Contract Status, Future in Cincinnati

Bengals defense needs Trey Hendrickson now more than ever



Trey Hendrickson has officially turned down a $28 million-per-year offer from the Cincinnati Bengals, intensifying his contract holdout and casting serious doubt over his future with the team. Despite leading the NFL in sacks last season, the star EDGE rusher remains unsigned long-term, fueling speculation that one of Cincinnati‚Äôs most dominant defenders could be on his way out in 2025.Trey Hendrickson isn‚Äôt just another pass rusher, he‚Äôs the most productive EDGE defender in the NFL over the last two seasons. After posting a league-leading 17 sacks in 2024 and a staggering total of 35 since 2023, Hendrickson has become the anchor of a Bengals defense that desperately needs his presence.Yet, despite his performance, the Bengals have reportedly offered just $28 million annually‚Äîa figure well below market value for a player of Hendrickson‚Äôs caliber. While the deal would place him eighth among NFL EDGE defenders in annual salary, it still falls short of what most believe he‚Äôs worth in today‚Äôs rising salary cap environment.According to NFL Network‚Äôs Tom Pelissero, Hendrickson isn‚Äôt demanding to surpass Myles Garrett‚Äôs record-setting $40 million AAV.Instead, he‚Äôs seeking multi-year security that reflects his elite status and long-term impact in Cincinnati.‚ÄúHe would like to get a multi-year deal that gives him security and keeps him in Cincinnati,‚Äù Pelissero stated on The Rich Eisen Show. ‚ÄúBengals just have not stepped up with significant enough of an offer for him to take it.‚ÄùThe Bengals‚Äô hesitation to lock in Trey Hendrickson is raising concerns‚Äîespecially after their defense struggled during the 2024 season. With Joe Burrow returning healthy, Cincinnati is back in win-now mode. Losing their top defensive player could seriously hurt those chances.Also Read: Michael Penix Jr. takes over as Falcons‚Äô starting QB; $27.5M Kirk Cousins moved to backup role To make matters worse, stars like T.J. Watt are also due for new deals, and market prices are rising. If the Bengals wait too long, they risk overpaying later or losing Hendrickson entirely. And if that happens, the Bengals may find out just how hard it is to replace a true game-changer off the edge.
Article Summary: Trey hendrickson has officially turned down a $28 million-per-year offer from the cincinnati bengals. The star edge rusher remains unsigned long-term, fueling speculation that one of cincinnati‚Äôs most dominant defenders could be on his way out in 2025.

Article Title: Michael Penix Jr. takes over as Falcons‚Äô starting QB; $27.5M Kirk Cousins moved to backup role
Article Text:
Michael Penix Jr. era begins in Atlanta (Image via: Getty Images)

Michael Penix Jr. era begins in Atlanta as Kirk Cousins takes a backseat

Atlanta Falcons 2025 Schedule Prediction | How will Michael Penix Jr. look as starting QB?

Falcons emerge as must-watch team in 2025 amid bold QB decision and trade rumors



‚ÄúThe Falcons are gambling that sophomore first-round pick Michael Penix Jr. can do more with a stacked group of offensive weapons than Kirk Cousins could in 2024.‚Äù

The Atlanta Falcons have named Michael Penix Jr. as their starting quarterback for the 2025 NFL season, moving veteran Kirk Cousins to a backup role. Cousins, who is set to earn $27.5 million, now faces trade speculation. With Penix taking over, the Falcons are entering a new era and one of the NFL‚Äôs biggest storylines is unfolding in Atlanta.The Atlanta Falcons are making headlines after officially naming Michael Penix Jr. as their starting quarterback for the 2025 NFL season. In a surprising move, veteran Kirk Cousins, who signed a $180 million deal just last year, has been moved to a backup role.Penix, the No. 8 overall pick in the 2024 NFL Draft, showed flashes of potential in three starts last season. Despite a 1-2 record, his big-play ability and aggressive downfield throws gave Atlanta fans a glimpse of what the future might hold. Now, that future is here.The decision signals a major shift for the franchise. Cousins was brought in to stabilize the offense and help the Falcons return to playoff relevance. But after an underwhelming season and mounting pressure from fans and media alike, the coaching staff is going all-in on youth and upside.Bleacher Report‚Äôs Brad Gagnon ranked the Falcons among the top teams to watch in 2025, pointing to their high-risk quarterback change as a key storyline.With the NFC South wide open, the timing couldn‚Äôt be more crucial. Atlanta has also upgraded its defense by drafting top prospects Jalon Walker and James Pearce Jr., adding fuel to a playoff push.Penix brings potential, but questions remain about his consistency, accuracy, and ability to handle pressure. Meanwhile, Cousins' future is uncertain, with trade rumors already circulating.Also Read: NFL Trade Rumors: Steelers eye $275M QB Trevor Lawrence as Aaron Rodgers‚Äô successor ahead of 2026 offseason NFL insider Brent Sobleski even suggested that a potential deal involving Cousins and the New Orleans Saints could still happen especially with Penix now firmly in control.
Article Summary: The atlanta falcons have named michael penix jr. as their starting quarterback for the 2025 nfl season. In a surprising move, veteran kirk cousins, who signed a $180 million deal just last year, has been moved to a backup role. Bleacher report‚Äôs brad gagnon ranked the falcons among the top teams to watch in 2025.

Article Title: Miami‚Äôs decision to draft Noah Igbinoghene over future All-Pro Jonathan Taylor still sparks backlash years later
Article Text:
Dolphins passed on Jonathan Taylor, and it still hurts (Image via: Getty Images)

Miami passed on Jonathan Taylor , and the regret hasn‚Äôt faded

The Miami Dolphins had three first-round picks in the 2020 NFL Draft. While Tua Tagovailoa and Austin Jackson remain starters, the pick that continues to draw criticism is Noah Igbinoghene. Miami passed on running back Jonathan Taylor, who has since become one of the league‚Äôs top rushers. That decision still sparks fan frustration and media backlash.With the No. 30 overall pick in the 2020 NFL Draft, the Miami Dolphins selected cornerback Noah Igbinoghene. At the time, the move raised questions, especially since running back Jonathan Taylor was still available.In three seasons with Miami, Igbinoghene started just five games before being traded to the Dallas Cowboys. Meanwhile, Taylor was selected at No. 41 overall by the Indianapolis Colts. Since then, he‚Äôs rushed for over 6,000 yards, ranking second in the NFL behind only Derrick Henry during that span.Taylor has already earned Pro Bowl honors and was named First-Team All-Pro in 2021. His impact has been consistent, and he‚Äôs become one of the league‚Äôs most reliable running backs. Igbinoghene, on the other hand, never made a lasting impact in Miami‚Äôs secondary.Bleacher Report‚Äôs Matt Holder recently called Igbinoghene the worst Dolphins draft pick of the last five years, not just because of his limited production, but because of who the team passed up. Putting Taylor into head coach Mike McDaniel‚Äôs offensive system could have changed everything.In 2023, the Dolphins had two running backs rush for over 800 yards. Adding Jonathan Taylor to that mix alongside Tua Tagovailoa, Tyreek Hill, and Jaylen Waddle might have made Miami‚Äôs offense one of the most dangerous in the league.Fans continue to look back at that 2020 draft with frustration. While Tagovailoa and Jackson have held up, the Igbinoghene pick is a clear miss. The Dolphins had a shot at one of the NFL‚Äôs best backs and passed.Also Read: Kylie Kelce opens about haircut warning sign that signals postpartum struggle: ‚ÄúTake me to the doctor‚Äù As Taylor keeps producing at a high level, Miami‚Äôs decision only looks worse with time. It remains one of the biggest draft "what-ifs" in recent team history.
Article Summary: The miami dolphins had three first-round picks in the 2020 nfl draft. They passed on running back jonathan taylor, who has since become one of the league‚Äôs top rushers. Instead, they selected cornerback noah igbinoghene, who started just five games.

Article Title: Why Wayne Gretzky was never drafted: The full story behind hockey's greatest mystery
Article Text:
Why Wayne Gretzky was never drafted: The full story behind hockey's greatest mystery(Image Via IG/@waynegretzky)

Wayne Gretzky's early days in the WHA and that contract, which changed everything

Wayne Gretzky üèí: The NHL Legend Who Was Never Actually Drafted! üöÄ #shorts #waynegretzky #nhl #hockey

Memories: Wayne Gretzky tallies his final NHL point

It might be an astonishing fact to learn that the greatest player in hockey history, Wayne Gretzky, was never drafted into the NHL . Current stars like Connor McDavid and Sidney Crosby had the honor of going first overall, but Wayne entered the league in an unusual backdoor way. This was not a case of some bizarre scouting miss; it was a perfect storm comprising age restriction, rival league, and one extraordinary contract in the making of hockey legends.Wayne Gretzky's path to the NHL began outside the NHL. At barely 17 years of age, he joined the World Hockey Association (WHA), a rival to the NHL, which allowed younger players to turn professional. He signed in 1978 with the Indianapolis Racers, but his stay there was short. After just eight games, the financially shaky team sold his contract to the Edmonton Oilers, another WHA franchise.Even so, Gretzky wasn‚Äôt an ordinary player. He had entered into a personal services contract, not a standard player contract. This meant that he was bound directly to the Oilers owner, Peter Pocklington, circumventing normal player rules. When the WHA merged with the NHL in 1979, the league found itself at a crossroads: would Gretzky be entered into the draft, or would he be allowed to play under his existing contract?In its endless whim against the league recession, the Colorado Rockies would supposedly snatch up my pick if I were drafted and moved.Hence, Gretzky insisted that he would remain in Edmonton. Following protracted deliberations, the NHL finally agreed to a compromise: the Oilers could keep Gretzky, but their draft order would be moved to the bottom for 1979. Thus, in 1979, they held the 21st overall pick and opted for Kevin Lowe, yet another future Hall of Famer.The introduction of Gretzky into the NHL marked the beginning of the epic dynasty in Edmonton. Over nine seasons, Gretzky led the Oilers to four Stanley Cups and set scoring records that no one has dared to touch till today, 2,857 career points, including 894 goals and 1,963 assists. While Alex Ovechkin did put an end to the goal record in 2025, no one has matched his total supremacy since.Also Read: From Canada‚Äôs hero to Donald Trump‚Äôs ally? Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs silence still feels like a betrayal to his home country Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs undrafted road to NHL greatness is a rare story told on the stage of timing, talent, and smart maneuvering. While today's prospects follow rigid draft rules, Gretzky proved that greatness does not always need permission to begin. His legacy remains one of the most remarkable and unrepeatable in all of sports history.
Article Summary: Wayne gretzky was never drafted into the nhl. He joined the world hockey association (wha), a rival to the nhl, when he was just 17 years old. He signed a personal services contract with the edmonton oilers, circumventing normal player rules.

Article Title: Connor McDavid's wife Lauren Kyle shares a heartfelt post about their family as the star player's future with the Oilers remains under speculation
Article Text:
Lauren Kyle recently made a heartfelt post about their small family.(Image via Lauren Kyle/Instagram)

Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife, Lauren Kyle, makes a heartwarming post about their adorable family, days after the Oilers lost to the Panthers in the Stanley Cup Finals



Image via Lauren Kyle/Instagram

Will Connor McDavid continue to play with the Edmonton Oilers even after the team‚Äôs devastating loss this year?



Connor McDavid, the Edmonton Oilers‚Äô captain, has been recovering from the devastating loss to the Florida Panthers in the 2025 Stanley Cup Finals last week but his wife, Lauren Kyle, has been a huge source of strength and support to him. Lauren Kyle has been managing her own work but is currently busy celebrating her birthday with her husband, Connor McDavid and their close friends. But it is Lauren Kyle‚Äôs recent heartfelt post that shows how deep her bond is with Connor McDavid.Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife, Lauren Kyle, shares her birthday with their adorable pet dog, Lenny and the couple has always shown their fans how deeply they love their adorable family of three.Recently, Lauren Kyle took to her Instagram stories to share heartwarming pictures of the couple alongside their pet dog. One of the pictures has Connor McDavid and Lauren Kyle sitting on their couches as they pose with their pet dog, while another shows Kyle hugging Lenny tightly.The caption for the post reads as, Most importantly, happy birthday to our baby boy Lenny‚Äù.Connor McDavid also made a heartfelt post on his social media to wish his wife and their pet dog.The star player shared adorable pictures of them posing with Lenny even on their wedding day.The caption for the post read as, ‚ÄúHappy Birthday Laur! You too Lenny, love you both so much ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ÄùAs of now, there are a lot of speculations about Connor McDavid‚Äôs future in the Edmonton Oilers as many fans believe he might be leaving the team in the upcoming season.However, Connor McDavid has not addressed such speculations directly and continues to maintain a low profile.Last week after the Oilers lost to the Florida Panthers, Connor McDavid appeared heartbroken as he spoke to the media and said, "We lost to a really good team‚Ä¶Nobody quit, nobody threw the towel in, but they‚Äôre a heck of a team. They‚Äôre back-to-back Stanley Cup champions for a reason."Also Read: ‚ÄúF**king love you, baby‚Äù: Brad Marchand and Matthew Tkachuk‚Äôs long hug shocks fans and sparks frenzy over their unexpected bond
Article Summary: Lauren kyle recently made a heartfelt post about their small family. Connor mcdavid‚Äôs wife, lauren kyle, shares her birthday with their adorable pet dog, lenny. The couple has always shown their fans how deeply they love their adorable family of three.

Article Title: John Tavares locks into an $18-million deal with the Toronto Maple Leafs
Article Text:
John Tavares locks into an $18-million deal with the Toronto Maple Leafs (Image Via Twitter)

Toronto Maple Leafs hold on to John Tavares with a leadership contract renovation

The deepest thoughts of John Tavares for his tenure with the Toronto Maple Leafs were put down as the signing of a four-year contract extension that betrayed his heart for the franchise. Emerging from free agency, Tavares made the choice to stay with his alma mater, for whom he had led for many years. The attempt of the Leafs to create a nucleus of veteran leadership and consequently stay at the top of the Eastern Conference comes at a very critical moment for the player and team. Tavares's decision to make such a decision spoke of something that transcended money with Toronto.Making a wise decision in the trade market, the Maple Leafs decided to lock up veteran John Tavares with a new four-year deal that now has him with the franchise through 2028‚Äì29. The $18 million extension reduces his annual cap hit to $4.38 million because of a deferred component to his salary, which will not be allowed anymore once the new league rules take effect from the 2026‚Äì27 season onward. For the first two years, Tavares enjoys full no-movement rights before it reverts to a five-team limited trade clause.Even in his mid-30s, Tavares is still performing at an elite level. He managed to set 74 points last season, with 38 goals in 75 regular-season games.He also managed to score five goals through 13 playoff games before Florida dashed Toronto‚Äôs hopes in the second round. He could have taken a shorter, perhaps more lucrative contract elsewhere, but Tavares remained loyal to Toronto. He would rather look at stability and continuing than starting fresh elsewhere.Ever since his debut in the NHL in 2009, with the New York Islanders selecting him first overall, Tavares has evolved into one of the most reliable offensive players in the league. His career stats depict his longevity and consistency: 1,114 points in 1,184 games. The memorable first season in Toronto saw him score 47 goals, while his best 2014-15 season with the Islanders cemented his status as an elite scorer.Tavares' resume also features international glory. A native of Mississauga, Ontario, he has represented Canada in numerous major tournaments. Most prominently, he won gold at the 2014 Winter Olympics and was an integral part of the 2016 World Cup of Hockey-winning team. With these triumphs behind him, the added leadership presence from the Maple Leafs' locker room will undoubtedly be a great value as they continue to chase the championship.Also Read: John Tavares' uncertain future with Maple Leafs as free agency looms and changes mount John Tavares' decision to stay with the Toronto Maple Leafs further underlines his position as a cornerstone of the franchise. As the team continues to strive for playoff success, Tavares' leadership and scoring depth remain critical. Through this contract, both the player and the team express their shared desire to bring a championship to Toronto.
Article Summary: John tavares signs a four-year contract extension with the toronto maple leafs. The $18 million extension reduces his annual cap hit to $4.38 million because of a deferred component to his salary. For the first two years, tavares enjoys full no-movement rights before it reverts to a five-team limited trade clause.

Article Title: NFL Trade Rumors: Steelers eye $275M QB Trevor Lawrence as Aaron Rodgers‚Äô successor ahead of 2026 offseason
Article Text:
Steelers eye Trevor Lawrence as potential 2026 QB (Image via: Getty Images)

Could Trevor Lawrence be Pittsburgh‚Äôs next franchise QB?



Aaron Rodgers Praises Steelers Leadership & Talent, Gives Life Updates On The Pat McAfee Show

Trevor Lawrence‚Äôs role as Jaguars‚Äô long-term QB could be on the line



With Aaron Rodgers likely headed into retirement after the 2025 NFL season, the Pittsburgh Steelers are reportedly keeping tabs on a potential blockbuster replacement‚Äî$275 million quarterback Trevor Lawrence. While Lawrence remains under contract with the Jaguars, growing doubts about his long-term fit in Jacksonville could open the door for a stunning trade in 2026 and the Steelers might just be ready to pounce.Aaron Rodgers signed a short-term deal with the Steelers, offering a temporary solution at quarterback. But with his career winding down, Pittsburgh must think long-term and ESPN‚Äôs Brooke Pryor has floated a name no one expected: Trevor Lawrence."Trading for a starting quarterback is rarer these days, and expensive, but not impossible. Trevor Lawrence could be worth an inquiry," Pryor noted.The Jaguars made a massive investment in Lawrence, handing him a five-year, $275 million extension, banking on his development into an elite, top-tier passer. Yet after four up-and-down seasons with only one playoff appearance in 2023‚Äîquestions remain about whether the former No.1 pick is truly their long-term answer.Lawrence enters the 2025 NFL season facing immense pressure to deliver. While he's showcased moments of brilliance, inconsistency has plagued his career. He‚Äôs yet to complete a full 17-game season at a high level, and the Jaguars' offense has failed to take the leap expected with him under center.If the struggles continue, Jacksonville could consider resetting and recovering value via a blockbuster trade. And few franchises are as desperate for a long-term quarterback as the Steelers.Since Ben Roethlisberger‚Äôs 2022 retirement, the Steelers have shuffled through short-term options without finding their true successor. Will Howard might get a shot, but he remains unproven. A player of Lawrence‚Äôs caliber could finally stabilize the franchise under head coach Mike Tomlin.Pairing Lawrence with Pittsburgh‚Äôs physical style of play and possibly D.K. Metcalf as his No. 1 target, could be the move that redefines both his career and the Steelers‚Äô future.Also Read: Miami‚Äôs decision to draft Noah Igbinoghene over future All-Pro Jonathan Taylor still sparks backlash years later Until then, Steelers fans should keep a close eye on the Jaguars and their $275 million man.
Article Summary: Steelers eye trevor lawrence as potential 2026 qb. Jacksonville jaguars made a massive investment in lawrence, handing him a five-year, $275 million extension, banking on his development into an elite, top-tier passer. But after four up-and-down seasons with only one playoff appearance in 2023‚Äîquestions remain about whether the former no.1 pick is truly their long-term answer.

Article Title: From injury to 8-year deal: Trent Frederic secures future with Edmonton Oilers
Article Text:
From injury to 8-year deal: Trent Frederic secures future with Edmonton Oilers (Image Via Twitter)

The eight-year deal of Trent Frederic solidifies the Oilers' trust in their long-term depth strategy

The Oilers, by almost entering into an eight-year contract extension with forward Trent Frederic, are making a sizable commitment. Brought in during the trade deadline through a complicated three-way deal, Frederic's value to the Oilers stretches far outside of regular-season statistics. He came into the team injured and had some regular-season time prior to the playoffs, and since his presence had become steady in their postseason run, this move declared Edmonton's long-term commitment to those role players who bring grit, depth, and consistency to the team as opposed to relying solely on star power.The Edmonton Oilers rushed to finalize an eight-year extension for Trent Frederic for an average annual value of just under $4 million. While not a big scorer with the puck, he is positioned more as a road-weary physical forward, which fits Edmonton's vision of creating a well-balanced team for the postseason.Frederic came over to Edmonton from Boston at the 2024-25 trade deadline in a complicated three-team trade where the New Jersey Devils retained 50% of his salary. The Oilers sent out a 2025 second-rounder, a 2026 fourth-rounder, defenseman Max Wanner, and forward Shane LaChance (who went to New Jersey).It was a savvy move to add some depth to the roster without crippling themselves on the salary side.Frederic got injured in the ankle when he arrived, playing just one regular-season game. However, he returned in the playoffs in time to play in all 22 postseason games. His stats-one goal, three assists-were not very flashy, but he brought a gritty presence and defensive responsibility that sometimes cannot be measured on the scoreboard.Now 26 years old, Frederic is in his prime. Locking him in for long-term development shows the Oilers' faith in his refinement. A short-term deal costing just below $4 million for a reliable, hard-nosed winger who has playoff experience is a very calculated risk for not only team depth but also chemistry and consistency.In today's NHL, guys like Frederic, who are cheap and consistent, can be the difference-makers in deep playoff runs. Edmonton feels he is one of those guys.Also Read: Lauren Kyle helped with developing the special connection between Leon Draisaitl and Connor McDavid on the ice The newest contract extension for Trent Frederic is more than simply a signing-it symbolizes the Oilers' outlook on a larger scale. In Edmonton, they are committing themselves to reliable role players with playoff grit as the very foundation on which they intend to build. Should Frederic stay healthy and on an upward trajectory, this deal could be central to the long-term success configuration for the franchise.
Article Summary: Edmonton oilers sign trent frederic to an eight-year contract extension. Frederic came over to edmonton from boston at the 2024-25 trade deadline in a complicated three-team trade where the new jersey devils retained 50% of his salary. The oilers are committing themselves to reliable role players with playoff grit as the very foundation on which they intend to build.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt afford to pay‚Äù: Dwyane Wade‚Äôs wife Gabrielle Union opens up about financial pressures despite the NBA legend‚Äôs massive net worth
Article Text:
Gabrielle Union, wife of Dwyane Wade, discussed her financial strategies at a recent event. She highlighted the need for multiple income streams. Union emphasized managing expenses, including supporting her extended family. She also mentioned dividing expenses with her husband, Dwyane Wade. The couple recently navigated Wade's health challenges. They continue to share updates about their lives with their fans.

Dwyane Wade‚Äôs wife, Gabrielle Union, opens up on finance issues and how she deals with them



Gabrielle Union and Dwyane Wade have proved how strong their marriage is after the NBA legend went through cancer and a major surgery



Dwyane Wade‚Äôs wife, Gabrielle Union, has always maintained her separate identity even after being married to one of the most popular and talented players in the history of NBA. The popular Hollywood actress has continued with her career in the entertainment industry and has made a name for herself. Even though Dwyane Wade is easily one of the richest athletes in the league, Gabrielle Union opened up about the struggle of maintaining a regular flow of payments and keeping up with expenses.Recently, Dwyane Wade‚Äôs wife, Gabrielle Union, was spotted at the American Black Film Festival in Miami where she spoke on the panel of ‚ÄúSisterhood & Savings‚Äù.The famous actress said,‚ÄúI don‚Äôt have the luxury of taking all the independent films that I want because I can‚Äôt afford to pay for my extended family in the way that they have grown accustomed to,‚ÄùGabrielle Union continued, ‚ÄúI have to factor in endorsements and brands and brand building‚Ä¶We don‚Äôt get paid what y‚Äôall think that we get paid, and that check is split so many ways. You have to have multiple revenue streams to do the job that you really love‚Ä¶‚ÄùDwyane Wade‚Äôs wife, Gabrielle Union, has always been pretty open about how she takes care of her own expenses and even after a decade of marriage with the NBA legend, continues to divide expenses with him.While Dwyane Wade has remained silent on his wife opening up about how she saves her money, he has been a huge source of strength and support to her.With the recent health scare that the NBA legend went through, Gabrielle Union has stayed by his side as a rock to support him.Now, months after the NBA legend, Dwyane Wade, has recovered from his kidney surgery, he has gone back to his regular life with Gabrielle Union and their daughter.The two have been pretty open about their regular lives and are pretty active with updating their fans about their lives as Dwyane Wade spends his time creating more awareness around cancer and his recovery from it.Also Read: ‚ÄúHow soft is the NBA now?‚Äù: Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs injury in Game 7 sparks heated debate among fans
Article Summary: Gabrielle union, wife of dwyane wade, discussed her financial strategies at a recent event. She highlighted the need for multiple income streams. Union emphasized managing expenses, including supporting her extended family. The couple recently navigated wade's health challenges.

Article Title: NHL trade news: Evander Kane heads to Vancouver Canucks after controversial season with Oilers
Article Text:
Evander Kane returns home to Vancouver after Oilers exit (Image via: Getty Images)

Evander Kane traded to Vancouver Canucks after controversial season with Oilers



Is Evander Kane trade a win-win for both Canucks and Oilers?

Evander Kane has been traded to the Vancouver Canucks after a disappointing 2024-25 season with the Edmonton Oilers. Injuries, playoff struggles, and criticism marked his year, leading to the Oilers moving him for a 2025 fourth-round pick. For Kane, it‚Äôs a fresh start in his hometown and a chance to focus on hockey, family, and redemption.The Edmonton Oilers‚Äô 2024-25 Stanley Cup run was overshadowed by Evander Kane‚Äôs inconsistent presence and performance. Injuries and surgeries kept the 33-year-old winger off the ice for much of the regular season, and his playoff return sparked criticism after several costly penalties during the Finals. Sportsnet‚Äôs Mark Spector even labeled him ‚Äúa liability‚Äù in Edmonton‚Äôs series loss to the Florida Panthers.Shortly after the Oilers‚Äô second straight defeat in the Stanley Cup Final, the team traded Kane to the Vancouver Canucks in exchange for a fourth-round pick in the 2025 NHL Draft. While the trade might look like a salary dump for Edmonton, Kane says the real motivation behind the move came from a personal place‚Äîhis children.‚ÄúAnybody who has kids understands that they automatically jump up to be the No. 1 priority in your life,‚Äù Kane told Sportsnet.‚ÄúI have four of them‚Ä¶ they‚Äôre all very young, and they‚Äôre all very excited to cheer dad on.‚Äù His move to Vancouver not only brings him closer to his family but also marks a return to his hometown roots.Born in Vancouver, Kane grew up watching the Canucks and previously played junior hockey for the Vancouver Giants, winning the Memorial Cup in 2007. Now, after suiting up for five different NHL teams and recording 617 points (326 goals, 291 assists) across 930 regular-season games, he returns to the city where it all began.‚ÄúThe fan base here is fantastic. They‚Äôre passionate, they love their hockey‚Ä¶ I know what hockey means in this city,‚Äù Kane said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm really privileged and honored to be part of that.‚Äù With the Canucks, he hopes to silence his critics and reset his narrative as both a player and a father.Also Read: Inside Matthew Schaefer‚Äôs journey: How top NHL prospect endured unimaginable loss of his mother and more As for Kane, the opportunity to start over in a familiar city, supported by his family, could be just what he needs to find his form again.
Article Summary: Evander kane has been traded to the vancouver canucks after a disappointing 2024-25 season with the edmonton oilers. Injuries, playoff struggles, and criticism marked his year, leading to the oilers moving him for a 2025 fourth-round pick. For kane, it‚Äôs a fresh start in his hometown and a chance to focus on hockey, family, and redemption.

Article Title: NiJaree Canady makes bold history with first million dollar NIL deal in women‚Äôs softball
Article Text:
NiJaree Canady makes bold history with first million dollar NIL deal in women‚Äôs softball (Image via Getty)

NiJaree Canady makes history with $1,050,024 NIL deal



Canady‚Äôs Rise pitching power, transfers, and MVP performances



Also Read:

A major milestone just changed the future of college softball. A young star, NiJaree Canady, has broken a major record‚Äîbut how did it all unfold? This spring, one name has been on everyone‚Äôs lips, from Texas to the national stage. She changed schools, shook up the sport, and now fans can‚Äôt stop talking. The deal she signed is so big, it‚Äôs a first in softball history. But there‚Äôs more: the timing, the place, and the people behind it will surprise you. Keep reading to find out the full story behind this historic moment.On July 24, 2024, NiJaree Canady, a standout pitcher from Stanford, officially transferred to Texas Tech in Lubbock, Texas, and immediately signed a one‚Äëyear Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL) contract worth $1,050,024. The amount included $1 million for her endorsement, $50,000 for living expenses, and $24 as a nod to her jersey number.This agreement made NiJaree Canady the first female college softball player ever to earn over one million dollars.The deal was arranged by Texas Tech‚Äôs NIL group, the Matador Club, supported by major boosters Tracy and John Sellers.NiJaree Canady was born on July 30, 2003, in Topeka, Kansas, and starred in basketball and softball at Topeka High School.She entered Stanford in 2023, quickly earning freshman pitcher awards and taking the team to two straight Women‚Äôs College World Series. In June 2024, she entered the transfer portal, and by late July, had moved to Texas Tech, attracted by the record‚Äësetting NIL offer and a new coaching staff led by Coach Gerry Glasco.NiJaree Canady didn‚Äôt just sign big money‚Äîshe proved it on the field.
